title: Oshan Modi
text:
I’m Oshan Modi, a data scientist on a mission to solve business problems through the power of machine learning. I’m constantly expanding my knowledge, from mastering new machine learning techniques to diving into game theory. With a strong foundation in statistics and predictive analytics, I combine technical expertise with business acumen to deliver actionable solutions. My portfolio showcases a diverse range of projects, from sales forecasting models to recommendation systems and natural language processing.
I have recently started working on computer vision problems and have also picked up skills in effective MLOps. I spend most of my time following MOOCs, competing on kaggle, playing with my dogs - Tuffy & Lyka.
